original_text: You will have to work hard for a long time before you have any food to eat. You will do this for your whole life until you die. Then you will return into the ground. That is where you came from. I made you from the soil of the ground, and you will become soil again.’
korean_text: 네가 흙으로 돌아갈 때까지 얼굴에 땀을 흘려야 먹을 것을 먹으리니 네가 그것에서 취함을 입었음이라 너는 흙이니 흙으로 돌아갈 것이니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You will have to work hard
before you have any food to eat
You will do this for your whole life
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 평생 동안 이것을 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then you will return into the ground
That is where you came from
I made you from the soil of the ground
and you will become soil again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 다시 흙이 될 것이다
